entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:56 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 08:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: ESE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 07:36 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 07:36 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 07:36 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
